wikipedia_page.main: Rhys Sharpe (born 17 October 1994) is a Northern Irish footballer who plays for National League North side Kettering Town, where he plays as a defender.

response: Following relegation to the newly formed Southern League Premier Central, Verma was one of four players still contracted to Tamworth for the 2018–19 season, along with Rhys Sharpe, Tom Shaw and Akwasi Asante.
